name: Joanne Manville Virtual Assistance
description:
Helping small businesses to tackle the jobs that are holding them back, by taking care of business admin and other tasks.
Whether it is compiling your expenses, writing policies, preparing a CV, proof reading, helping with your social media, chasing bad debts, arranging an event or booking a holiday, as your Virtual Assistant, I may be able to help you get back some of your valuable time.
